GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
kcm: fix strp_init() order and cleanup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit f865976baa85915c7672f351b74d5974b93215f6, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit e5571240236c5652f3e079b1d5866716a7ad819c. For more details please see the references link.
